name: Dark for Glip
additional_info:
Update - 2/14/2018
Text for Tasks white

Update - 2/26/2018
Made uploaded file name text visible after being visited.

Update - 5/31/2018
Fixed post-text font colour matching the background.

Update - 6/4/2018
Made emojis display at 30x30 pixels instead of the default 20x20 pixels.

Update - 7/25/2018
- Made the new top bar less intrusive and white.
- Lowered the height of the search bar.
- Adjusted spacing on the top bar buttons.

Update - 7/30/2018
- Fixed thin white bar at bottom of window.

Update - 8/29/2018
- Increased emoji size from 30px to 35px.

Update - 10/4/2018
- Removed the white border and background from interactive message items.
